testsuite.name: com.sp.fc.web.test.AuthorityBasicTest

testcase.name: 1. greeting 메시지를 불러온다.

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <hello jongwon> but was: <{"timestamp":"2021-05-27T12:18:28.559+00:00","status":500,"error":"Internal Server Error","message":"","path":"/greeting/jongwon"}>
